src:
Trots motgångarna – historien talar för fortsatt styre för Trump
NEW YORK. Med ett år kvar till presidentvalet ser Donald Trumps möjligheter att säkra ytterligare en mandatperiod goda ut. Trots den pågående riksrättsprocessen har han starkt stöd i de vågmästarstater som avgjorde valet till hans fördel 2016.
05 Nov 2019, 15:32 by Frida Wallnor

text:
Despite the setbacks - history speaks for continued rule for Trump
NEW YORK. With one year left for the presidential election, Donald Trump's opportunities to secure another term in office look good. In spite of the ongoing judicial process, he has strong support in the wave master states that decided the election in his favor in 2016.
05 Nov 2019, 15:32 by Frida Wallnor
